rows.label: tlk70000013_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Curse the Grail! Going around and
messing everything up... If only I was
younger, I'd take 'im down a peg...

rows.label: tlk70000013_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm not just talking about wrecking the
city, either! Blades set against humans
harms our very culture.

rows.label: tlk70000013_02_msg0003
rows.name:
'Course, not all Iirans are on board
with the idea of co-existing with Blades,
you know. There's that other lot...

rows.label: tlk70000013_02_msg0004
rows.name:
What do they call themselves? Oh, yes.
That's right. The counter-Adelites.
They've got some funny ideas.

rows.label: tlk70000013_02_msg0005
rows.name:
In any case, I'm not letting this country
fall apart without a fight. It's my home,
and I love it.
